anya-e0105n32:1: Kaṅkhāvitaraṇiṃ nāma pātimokkhaṭṭhakathaṃ ācariyabuddhaghosatthero soṇattherena yācito mahāvihāravāsīnaṃ vācanāmagganissitaṃ sīhaḷapātimokkhaṭṭhakathānayaṃ nissāya ekampi padaṃ pāḷiyā vā mahāvihāravāsīnaṃ porāṇaṭṭhakathāhi vā avirodhetvā akāsi. Tena vuttaṃ tissaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ –
anya-e0105n32:7: Vattayissāmi nāmena, kaṅkhāvitaraṇiṃ subha’’nti kaṅkhā aṭṭha. ganthārambhakathā ca.
anya-e0105n32:10: Nissāya sā ayaṃ niṭṭhaṃ, gatā ādāya sabbaso;
anya-e0105n32:12: Na hettha taṃ padaṃ atthi, yaṃ virujjheyya pāḷiyā;
anya-e0105n32:13: Mahāvihāravāsīnaṃ, porāṇaṭṭhakathāhi vā’’ti kaṅkhā. aṭṭha. nigamanakathā ca.
